pr_title: Fix Jormungand's prison task location for the Slayer Plugin

timeline.message: add to whitelist and add unit tests

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: This var name should be changed as well. It should become TASK_CHECKSLAYERGEM_KONAR_2 and move next to that line earlier in the file.
replies.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.author: Nightfirecat

timeline.bodyText: Is this meant to throw IOException?
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText:
This is to be consistent with https://github.com/runelite/runelite/pull/11128/files#diff-e1297a0ae6bdf66b5be1b855ea54e07bR765 since they are testing the same code.
I can reorder the tests to make this a bit more clear.
replies.author: thomaschow

timeline.bodyText: Why is this validating that the chat message manager is making changes here? This is not testing the right behavior. Instead, this should be similar to testCheckSlayerGemKonarTask().
timeline.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: I intended for this test to be similar to testTaskLookup in that it tests taskLookup does what's expected (update the chat message if we have a whitelisted task location). In this case I'm doing slightly more end-to-end testing by starting the test from the the NPC dialog, but I can remove the earlier "setup" code if we want to contain the test to just that one method.
replies.author: thomaschow

replies.bodyText: @Nightfirecat would this be an acceptable test given my earlier comment?
replies.author: thomaschow

replies.bodyText: That test is specififally verifying lookup. This one does not need to.
replies.author: Nightfirecat

replies.bodyText: I'm happy to remove these tests altogether then; I'm simply adding an entry to the locations whitelist which is used in taskLookup
replies.author: thomaschow

replies.bodyText: That seems like a good solution. We've got pretty sufficient tests for this code path in the plugin and just need to add the new location. 👍
replies.author: Nightfirecat
